EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 6_Hybrid cloud for financial services
EmailTemplate.subject: Discover successful implementations of public-private hybrid clouds
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Use cases based on multiple SUCCESSFUL cloud implementations Hello Sir/Madam,
Develop a new cloud architecture by leveraging what others have learned through the process.
Read the use case “Public-private cloud for financial services <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_Hybrid.Cloud.Financial.LP.html?did=d000000000aj&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 6b-hybridcloudforfinancialservicesusecase&utm_term=finance]]>” to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations and how you can:
- Upgrade your large enterprise environment into a private cloud without needing a forklift - Provide access to public cloud as part of a hybrid cloud approach - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
